main event: An observer sighted a flashing red light that turned white on April 1, 1968.
interesting points: The observer reported the object moved from East to North., The color of the object included all red with a very bright glowing top., The sighting lasted approximately 2 hours and 5 minutes., The observer was able to provide details about the object's movement and visibility conditions., The report concluded there was insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: flashing red light that turned white
